description:
Kaoruko Moeta (Pen name: Kaos) is a brand new 4-panel manga artist, trying to get into the business. However, she finds out that her series had gotten the worst survey results. Her editor worries about her wellbeing and suggests that she go live at an all-girls dorm for manga artists.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Got the Worst Results on the Survey?!
アンケート ビリですか!?
